description: de- (“prefix indicating removal or reversal”) +‎ perm(anent magnet).

entries.meaning: (chiefly nautical) The act or process of deperming.

verbs.description: deperm (third-person singular simple present deperms, present participle deperming, simple past and past participle depermed)

entries.meaning: (transitive, chiefly nautical) To degauss or demagnetize; especially, to degauss a ship by dragging a large powered electrical cable along its side.
